newsitem.title: USA: FGIC qualifies eight bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: FGIC qualifies eight bond issues for insurance.

text.p: FGIC said it qualified for insurance eight bond issues slated for competitive sale today.
--Huntley Commission Consolidated SD, Ill., $7 million of school building bonds.
--Rockford Park, Ill., $3.2 million and $3.5 million of GO bonds.
--Carteret County, N.C, $21 million of GO bonds.
--Union County, N.C., $26 million , $8 million and $3.2 million of GO bonds.
--Brookhaven, N.Y., $24 million of public improvement bonds.
--Sherwood, Ore., $1.7 million of GO bonds and $6.2 million of GO bonds under direct purchase program.
--Riverside Beaver SD, Pa., $20 million of GO bonds.
